sentence.Network_en: Such implacability may simply disguise shyness or arrogance.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种冷漠无情也许仅仅是为了掩饰害羞或傲慢.

sentence.Network_en: Yet her race was a race with the vagaries and implacability of fate.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而,她的民族却是个天命不可知、命不可违的民族.
